column1: Little Goat Diner////It was dinner time
column2: several weeks after my first encounter with the little goat
column3: but I still had their breakfast on the brain. So I ordered the Fat Elvis Waffles - I ate the entire dish
column4: and walked out feeling like fat Elvis (a quite happy
column6: to boot). They were amazing - thick
column8: and with plenty of luscious peanut butter butter to smear all over them. Topped with sliced banana and maple bacon syzurp. Positively delectable.
